sentences.en: All this leaves the poor public with whiplash.
sentences.cn: 这只能让可怜的公众无所适从.

sentences.en: But these poisonings from the agua mala came quickly and struck like a whiplash.
sentences.cn: 但是这水母的毒素发作得更快,痛得像挨鞭子抽一般.

sentences.en: Cervical whiplash injury is a frequently seen injury in peacetime, especially in traffic accidents.
sentences.cn: 颈部挥鞭伤是一种平常的意外事故, 特别是交通事故中的常见伤类.

sentences.en: Examples on passive safety systems include safety belts, airbags, and WHIPS whiplash protection system.
sentences.cn: 被动安全系统组成包括安全带 、 安全气囊, 和whips头颈部保护系统.

sentences.en: He was very bruised and suffering from whiplash.
sentences.cn: 他满身青肿，而且颈部过度屈伸受伤。

sentences.en: Key words: neck pain; whiplash injuries; randomized controlled trials; prospectie studies; physical therapy; immobilization.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 颈部疼痛; 挥鞭伤; 随机对照试验; 前瞻性研究; 理疗; 固定.

sentences.en: Objective To study the MR manifestations of whiplash injury syndrome of spinal cord.
sentences.cn: 目的认识脊髓型鞭击损伤综合征的MR影像表现.

sentences.en: Objective. To summarize evidence concerning physical prognostic factors for development of Late Whiplash Syndrome ( LWS ).
sentences.cn: 目的:概述关于颈鞭击综合征 ( LWS ) 发展的身体预后因素的文献证据.
一名警官颈部过度屈伸受伤。

sentences.en: Playing against Zebre in England's first outing, he suffered a whiplash injury to his neck.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰队首次对阵热布里的比赛中，他颈部受了挥鞭伤。

sentences.en: Study Design. A prospective 10 - year follow - up study of patients with whiplash - associated disorders ( WAD ) and asymptomatic volunteers.
sentences.cn: 研究设计: 一项对于挥鞭样相关疾病和无症状志愿者的10年前瞻性随访.

sentences.en: The solution that the Volvo engineers came up with was WHIPS ( Whiplash Protection System ).
sentences.cn: Volvo工程师所提出的解决方案是whips ( 头颈部保护系统 ).

sentences.en: This is a whiplash injury from the impact.
sentences.cn: 一撞之下,我颈部就扭伤了.

sentences.en: You know, your mood swings are kind of giving me whiplash.
sentences.cn: 你知道么, 你的喜怒无常让我觉得不安.

sentences.en: Your mood swings are kind of giving me a whiplash.
sentences.cn: 你心情的变化就好像是给了我一鞭子.
